alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued June 04 at 3:51PM EDT until June 05 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...High astronomical tides and storm surge of around a foot will combine to bring some minor flooding impacts around the time of high tide tonight. Low lying roads and areas that typically experience flooding in these situations should expect water up to a foot deep around high tide. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal York and Coastal Cumberland Counties. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 2 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/12 PM 8.4 -0.4 0.3 6-7 None 05/12 AM 10.7 1.9 1.1 6 None 05/01 PM 8.6 -0.2 0.4 6-7 None 06/01 AM 10.6 1.8 0.8 4-5 None 06/02 PM 8.6 -0.2 0.4 3-4 None 07/02 AM 10.2 1.4 0.4 2-3 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/12 PM 8.6 -0.9 0.3 7 None 05/12 AM 11.0 1.5 1.1 7 Minor 05/01 PM 8.8 -0.7 0.4 7 None 06/01 AM 10.9 1.4 0.8 5 None 06/02 PM 8.9 -0.6 0.4 3-4 None 07/02 AM 10.4 0.9 0.4 2-3 None Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/12 PM 9.5 -0.2 0.4 1 None 05/12 AM 12.0 2.3 1.1 2 Minor 05/01 PM 9.7 -0.0 0.4 2 None 06/01 AM 12.1 2.4 1.0 1 Minor 06/02 PM 9.7 -0.0 0.4 1 None 07/02 AM 11.4 1.7 0.4 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
